items.title: Awesome Testing
items.content_text:

*   [Awesome Cucumber (⭐44)](https://github.com/virajkulkarni14/awesome-cucumber) - A (relatively-newer) curated list of awesome Cucumber and Gherkin-related resources.
items.content_html:
Suggested Awesome Lists / Useful References

  • Awesome Cucumber (⭐44) - A (relatively-newer) curated list of awesome Cucumber and Gherkin-related resources.

items.title: Awesome Design Patterns
items.content_text:
### Programming Language Design Patterns

*   AngularJS
    *   [design patterns (⭐2k)](https://github.com/mgechev/angularjs-in-patterns)
*   JavaScript
    *   [es6 design patterns (⭐353)](https://github.com/ziyasal/design-patterns-and-idioms-in-es6)
    *   [humans (⭐4.4k)](https://github.com/sohamkamani/javascript-design-patterns-for-humans) - ultra simplified explanation to design patterns.
    *   [design-patterns (⭐31)](https://github.com/nnupoor/js_designpatterns)
    *   [design patterns by addy osmani](https://addyosmani.com/resources/essentialjsdesignpatterns/book)
*   Scala
    *   [design-patterns (⭐204)](https://github.com/josephguan/scala-design-patterns)
*   TypeScript
    *   [design-patterns (⭐5.3k)](https://github.com/torokmark/design_patterns_in_typescript)
*   UML
    *   [design-patterns quick reference](http://www.mcdonaldland.info/2007/11/28/40)
    *   [design-patterns cheat-sheet](https://www.slideshare.net/hustwj/design-patterns-cheat-sheet)

### Cloud Architecture

*   [Cloud cost hacking](https://hackernoon.com/cloud-cost-hacking-fc35fd19985d) - Patterns for reducing cloud costs.

### DevOps & containers

*   [kubernetes patterns (⭐32)](https://github.com/ro14nd-talks/kubernetes-patterns) - Presentation around the book kubernetes paterns.
items.content_html:
Programming Language Design Patterns

  • AngularJS
    • design patterns (⭐2k)
  • JavaScript
    • es6 design patterns (⭐353)
    • humans (⭐4.4k) - ultra simplified explanation to design patterns.
    • design-patterns (⭐31)
    • design patterns by addy osmani
  • Scala
    • design-patterns (⭐204)
  • TypeScript
    • design-patterns (⭐5.3k)
  • UML
    • design-patterns quick reference
    • design-patterns cheat-sheet

Cloud Architecture

  • Cloud cost hacking - Patterns for reducing cloud costs.

DevOps & containers

  • kubernetes patterns (⭐32) - Presentation around the book kubernetes paterns.

items.title: Awesome Swift
items.content_text:
### Key Value Store

*   [SecureDefaults (⭐228)](https://github.com/vpeschenkov/SecureDefaults) - A lightweight wrapper over UserDefaults & NSUserDefaults with an extra AES-256 encryption layer.
items.content_html:
Key Value Store

  • SecureDefaults (⭐228) - A lightweight wrapper over UserDefaults & NSUserDefaults with an extra AES-256 encryption layer.

items.content_html:

items.title: Awesome List
items.content_text:
### Platforms

*   [Node.js (⭐62k)](https://github.com/sindresorhus/awesome-nodejs#readme) - Async non-blocking event-driven JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 JavaScript engine.
    *   [Cross-Platform (⭐1.2k)](https://github.com/bcoe/awesome-cross-platform-nodejs#readme) - Writing cross-platform code on Node.js.
items.content_html:
Platforms

  • Node.js (⭐62k) - Async non-blocking event-driven JavaScript runtime built on Chrome's V8 JavaScript engine.
    • Cross-Platform (⭐1.2k) - Writing cross-platform code on Node.js.

items.title: Awesome Cl
items.content_text:
### Atom, Pulsar / Third-party APIs

*   [SLIMA (⭐63)](https://github.com/neil-lindquist/slima) allows you to
    interactively develop Common Lisp code, turning Atom (or now Pulsar) into a
    pretty good, and actively developped, Lisp IDE. [MIT](https://opensource.org/licenses/MIT).
items.content_html:
Atom, Pulsar / Third-party APIs

  • SLIMA (⭐63) allows you to interactively develop Common Lisp code, turning Atom (or now Pulsar) into a pretty good, and actively developped, Lisp IDE. MIT.
